f1.name: Judgment's Flames Set
f1.effect: +50% Damage Amount to Instinct Cards used against Ravaged targets.

f2.name: Orb of Inhibition Set
f2.effect: When Hitting 2 times with 1 Attack Card, +10% Damage Amount to Void Cards for 1 turn(2 times per turn).

f5.name: Line of Justice Set
f5.effect: +20% Critical Chance of cards that cost 2 or more

f7.name: Bullet of Order Set
f7.effect: When an Attack Card is used, increase Damage Amount of Order Cards by 10% for 1 turn (2 times per turn)

f8.name: Cursed Corpse Set
f8.effect: Increase damage dealt to targets inflicted with Agony by 10%

f9.name: Offering of the Void Set
f9.effect: When a card is Exhausted, increase Damage Amount of Void Cards by 20% for 1 turn(1 times per turn)

f11.name: Instinctual Growth Set
f11.effect: When there are 4 or more Cards in hand, increase Damage Amount of Instinct Cards by 20%

f12.name: Seth's Scarab Set
f12.effect: Increase the damage, Shield, and Healing of Basic Cards by 20%

f13.name: Spark of Passion Set
f13.effect: When an Upgrade Card is Used, increase Damage Amount of the next 5 Passion Cards used by 20%
